example.parse: والسؤال: ما سر ارتباط موسم الشتاء بالاستقرار العائلي؟

(VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حضر) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اطلاق) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المسابقة))) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الوزير) (NOUN_PROP غسلان) (NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG سلامة)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعتذر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عدم) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المشاركة)))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN ارتباط) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN جلسة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوزراء)))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: with the meeting of the Council of Ministers

role.argrole: bound to what (Usually marked by بـ)
